revised_title: Modeling Deformation and Rupture of Fiber-Reinforced Ceramic Matrix Composites
tldr: This article presents a component design-based model for the deformation and rupture of tough fiber-reinforced ceramic matrix composites. The model is based on a single damage state parameter and accounts for fiber failure, debonding, and fiber pull-out. It aims to help in designing components with high strength, toughness, and resistance to environmental factors.
